   20: -module(re_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2, pcre2/1,compile_options/1,
   24:          old_pcre1/1,
   25:          pcre2_incompat/1,
   26: 	 run_options/1,combined_options/1,replace_autogen/1,
   27: 	 global_capture/1,replace_input_types/1,replace_with_fun/1,replace_return/1,
   28: 	 split_autogen/1,split_options/1,split_specials/1,
   29: 	 error_handling/1,pcre_cve_2008_2371/1,re_version/1,
   30: 	 pcre_compile_workspace_overflow/1,re_infinite_loop/1, 
   31: 	 re_backwards_accented/1,opt_dupnames/1,opt_all_names/1,inspect/1,
   32: 	 opt_no_start_optimize/1,opt_never_utf/1,opt_ucp/1,
   33: 	 match_limit/1,sub_binaries/1,copt/1,global_unicode_validation/1,
   34:          yield_on_subject_validation/1, bad_utf8_subject/1,
   35:          error_info/1]).
   36: 
   37: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   38: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   39: 
   40: suite() ->
   41:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   42:      {timetrap,{minutes,3}}].
   43: 
   44: all() -> 
   45:     [pcre2, compile_options, run_options, combined_options,
   46:      old_pcre1,
   47:      pcre2_incompat,
   48:      replace_autogen, global_capture, replace_input_types,
   49:      replace_with_fun, replace_return, split_autogen, split_options,
   50:      split_specials, error_handling, pcre_cve_2008_2371,
   51:      pcre_compile_workspace_overflow, re_infinite_loop, 
   52:      re_backwards_accented, opt_dupnames, opt_all_names, 
   53:      inspect, opt_no_start_optimize,opt_never_utf,opt_ucp,
   54:      match_limit, sub_binaries, re_version, global_unicode_validation,
   55:      yield_on_subject_validation, bad_utf8_subject,
   56:      error_info].
   57: 
   58: groups() -> 
   59:     [].
   60: 
   61: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   62:     Config.
   63: 
   64: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   65:     ok.
   66: 
   67: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   68:     Config.
   69: 
   70: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   71:     Config.
   72: 
   73: 
   74: %% Run all applicable tests from the PCRE2 testsuites.
   75: pcre2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   76:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   77:     Res = run_pcre_tests:test(RootDir),
   78:     0 = lists:sum([ X || {X,_,_} <- Res ]),
   79:     {comment,Res}.
   80: 
   81: %% Run tests from the old PCRE testsuites.
   82: old_pcre1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   83:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   84:     Res = run_old_pcre1_tests:test(RootDir),
   85:     0 = lists:sum([ X || {X,_,_} <- Res ]),
   86:     {comment,Res}.
   87: 
   88: %% Test all documented compile options.
   89: compile_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   90:     ok = ctest("ABDabcdABCD","abcd",[],true,{match,[{3,4}]}),
   91:     ok = ctest("ABDabcdABCD","abcd",[anchored],true,nomatch),
   92:     ok = ctest("ABDabcdABCD",".*abcd",[anchored],true,{match,[{0,7}]}),
   93:     ok = ctest("ABCabcdABC","ABCD",[],true,nomatch),
   94:     ok = ctest("ABCabcdABC","ABCD",[caseless],true,{match,[{3,4}]}),
   95:     ok = ctest("abcdABC\n","ABC$",[],true,{match,[{4,3}]}),
   96:     ok = ctest("abcdABC\n","ABC$",[dollar_endonly],true,nomatch),
   97:     ok = ctest("abcdABC\n","ABC.",[],true,nomatch),
   98:     ok = ctest("abcdABC\n","ABC.",[dotall],true,{match,[{4,4}]}),
   99:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","ABC .",[],true,nomatch),
  100:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","ABC .",[extended],true,{match,[{4,4}]}),
  101:     ok = ctest("abcd\nABCD","ABC",[],true,{match,[{5,3}]}),
  102:     ok = ctest("abcd\nABCD","ABC",[firstline],true,nomatch),
  103:     ok = ctest("abcd\nABCD","^ABC",[],true,nomatch),
  104:     ok = ctest("abcd\nABCD","^ABC",[multiline],true,{match,[{5,3}]}),
  105:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","(ABC)",[],true,{match,[{4,3},{4,3}]}),
  106:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","(ABC)",[no_auto_capture],true,{match,[{4,3}]}),
  107:     ok = ctest(notused,"(?<FOO>ABC)|(?<FOO>DEF)",[],false,notused),
  108:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","(?<FOO>ABC)|(?<FOO>DEF)",[dupnames],true,{match,[{4,3},{4,3}]}),
  109:     ok = ctest("abcdABCDabcABCD","abcd.*D",[],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  110:     ok = ctest("abcdABCDabcABCD","abcd.*D",[ungreedy],true,{match,[{0,8}]}),
  111:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[],true,nomatch),
  112:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[{newline,cr}],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  113:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  114:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[{newline,lf}],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  115:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,lf}],true,nomatch),
  116:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,cr}],true,nomatch),
  117:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  118: 
  119:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,nomatch),
  120:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,nomatch),
  121:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  122: 
  123:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  124:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  125:     ok.
  126: 
  127: %% Test all documented run specific options.
  128: run_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  129:     rtest("ABCabcdABC","abc",[],[], match),
  130:     rtest("ABCabcdABC","abc",[anchored],[], nomatch),
  131:     %% Anchored in run overrides unanchored in compilation
  132:     rtest("ABCabcdABC","abc",[],[anchored], nomatch),
  133: 
  134:     rtest("","a?b?",[],[], match),
  135:     rtest("","a?b?",[],[notempty], nomatch),
  136: 
  137:     rtest("abc","^a",[],[], match),
  138:     rtest("abc","^a",[],[notbol], nomatch),
  139:     rtest("ab\nc","^a",[multiline],[], match),
  140:     rtest("ab\nc","^a",[multiline],[notbol], nomatch),
  141:     rtest("ab\nc","^c",[multiline],[notbol], match),
  142: 
  143:     rtest("abc","c$",[],[], match),
  144:     rtest("abc","c$",[],[noteol], nomatch),
  145: 
  146:     rtest("ab\nc","b$",[multiline],[], match),
  147:     rtest("ab\nc","c$",[multiline],[], match),
  148:     rtest("ab\nc","b$",[multiline],[noteol], match),
  149:     rtest("ab\nc","c$",[multiline],[noteol], nomatch),
  150: 
  151:     rtest("abc","ab",[],[{offset,0}], match),
  152:     rtest("abc","ab",[],[{offset,1}], nomatch),
  153: 
  154:     rtest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[],[], nomatch),
  155:     rtest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[],[], match),
  156:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[],[{newline,lf}], nomatch),
  157: 
  158:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(".*(abcd).*"),
  159:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[]),
  160:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all}]),
  161:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all,index}]),
  162:     {match,["ABCabcdABC","abcd"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all,list}]),
  163:     {match,[<<"ABCabcdABC">>,<<"abcd">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all,binary}]),
  164:     {match,[{0,10}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,first}]),
  165:     {match,[{0,10}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,first,index}]),       {match,["ABCabcdABC"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,first,list}]),
  166:     {match,[<<"ABCabcdABC">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,first,binary}]),
  167: 
  168:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all_but_first}]),
  169:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all_but_first,index}]),
  170:     {match,["abcd"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all_but_first,list}]),
  171:     {match,[<<"abcd">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all_but_first,binary}]),
  172: 
  173:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,none}]),
  174:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,none,index}]),
  175:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,none,list}]),
  176:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,none,binary}]),
  177: 
  178:     {ok,MP2} = re:compile(".*(?<FOO>abcd).*"),
  179:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,[1]}]),
  180:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,['FOO']}]),
  181:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,["FOO"]}]),
  182:     {match,["abcd"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,["FOO"],list}]),
  183:     {match,[<<"abcd">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,["FOO"],binary}]),
  184: 
  185:     {match,[{-1,0}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,[200]}]),
  186:     {match,[{-1,0}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,['BAR']}]),
  187:     {match,[""]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,[200],list}]),
  188:     {match,[""]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,['BAR'],list}]),
  189:     {match,[<<>>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,[200],binary}]),
  190:     {match,[<<>>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,['BAR'],binary}]),
  191: 
  192:     {ok, MP3} = re:compile(".*((?<FOO>abdd)|a(..d)).*"),
  193:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4},{-1,0},{4,3}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP3,[]),
  194:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4},{-1,0},{4,3}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP3,[{capture,all,index}]),
  195:     {match,[<<"ABCabcdABC">>,<<"abcd">>,<<>>,<<"bcd">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP3,[{capture,all,binary}]),
  196:     {match,["ABCabcdABC","abcd",[],"bcd"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP3,[{capture,all,list}]),
  197:     ok.
  198: 
  199: 
  200: pcre2_incompat(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  201:     %% Not allowed to pass changed newline option to re:run/3
  202:     rtest("abcdABCabcABC\nD", "abcd.*D", [], [{newline,cr}],  badarg),
  203:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n", "abcd$", [], [{newline,crlf}],  badarg),
  204:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n", "abcd$", [], [{newline,anycrlf}],  badarg),
  205:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r", "abcd$", [], [{newline,any}],  badarg),
  206: 
  207:     [rtest("abcdABCabcd\r", "abcd$", [{newline,C}], [{newline,R}],  badarg)
  208:      || C <- [lf, cr, crlf, anycrlf, any],
  209:         R <- [lf, cr, crlf, anycrlf, any],
  210:         C =/= R],
  211: 
  212:     %% But we do allowed to pass an unchanged newline option to re:run/3
  213:     rtest("abcdABCabcABC\rD", "abcd.*D", [], [{newline,lf}],  match),
  214: 
  215:     [rtest("abcABC", "abc", [{newline,NL}], [{newline,NL}],  match)
  216:      || NL <- [lf, cr, crlf, anycrlf, any]],
  217: 
  218:     %% Not allowed to pass changed BSR option to re:run/3
  219:     rtest("abcdABCabcABC\nD", "abcd.*D", [], [bsr_anycrlf],  badarg),
  220:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r", "abcd$", [bsr_unicode], [bsr_anycrlf], badarg),
  221:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r", "abcd$", [bsr_anycrlf], [bsr_unicode], badarg),
  222: 
  223:     %% But we do allowed an unchanged BSR option to re:run/3
  224:     rtest("abcd\x{85}D", "abcd\\RD", [], [bsr_unicode],  match),
  225:     rtest("abcd\x{85}D", "abcd\\RD", [bsr_unicode], [bsr_unicode],  match),
  226:     rtest("abcd\r\nD", "abcd\\RD", [bsr_anycrlf], [bsr_anycrlf],  match),
  227:     ok.
  228: 
  229: %% Test the version is returned correctly
  230: re_version(_Config) ->
  231:     Version = re:version(),
  232:     {match,[Version]} = re:run(Version,
  233:                                ~B"^\d{2}\.\d{2} 20\d{2}-\d{2}-\d{2}",
  234:                                [{capture,all,binary}]),
  235:     ok.
  236: 
  237: global_unicode_validation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  238:     %% Test that unicode validation of the subject is not done
  239:     %% for every match found...
  240:     Bin = binary:copy(<<"abc\n">>,100000),
  241:     {TimeAscii, _} = take_time(fun () ->
  242:                                        re:run(Bin, <<"b">>, [global])
  243:                                end),
  244:     {TimeUnicode, _} = take_time(fun () ->
  245:                                          re:run(Bin, <<"b">>, [unicode,global])
  246:                                  end),
  247:     if TimeAscii == 0; TimeUnicode == 0 ->
  248:             {comment, "Not good enough resolution to compare results"};
  249:        true ->
  250:             %% The time the operations takes should be in the
  251:             %% same order of magnitude. If validation of the
  252:             %% whole subject occurs for every match, the unicode
  253:             %% variant will take way longer time...
  254:             true = TimeUnicode div TimeAscii < 10
  255:     end.
  256: 
  257: take_time(Fun) ->
  258:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
  259:     Res = Fun(),
  260:     End = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
  261:     {End-Start, Res}.
  262: 
  263: yield_on_subject_validation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  264:     Go = make_ref(),
  265:     Bin = binary:copy(<<"abc\n">>,100000),
  266:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
  267:                                receive Go -> ok end,
  268:                                {match,[{1,1}]} = re:run(Bin, <<"b">>, [unicode])
  269:                        end,
  270:                        [link, monitor]),
  271:     1 = erlang:trace(P, true, [running]),
  272:     P ! Go,
  273:     N = count_re_run_trap_out(P, M),
  274:     true = N >= 5,
  275:     ok.
  276: 
  277: count_re_run_trap_out(P, M) when is_reference(M) ->
  278:     receive {'DOWN',M,process,P,normal} -> ok end,
  279:     TD = erlang:trace_delivered(P),
  280:     receive {trace_delivered, P, TD} -> ok end,
  281:     count_re_run_trap_out(P, 0);
  282: count_re_run_trap_out(P, N) when is_integer(N) ->
  283:     receive
  284:         {trace,P,out,{erlang,re_run_trap,3}} ->
  285:             count_re_run_trap_out(P, N+1)
  286:     after 0 ->
  287:             N
  288:     end.
  289: 
  290: %% Test compile options given directly to run.
  291: combined_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  292:     ok = crtest("ABDabcdABCD","abcd",[],true,{match,[{3,4}]}),
  293:     ok = crtest("ABDabcdABCD","abcd",[anchored],true,nomatch),
  294:     ok = crtest("ABDabcdABCD",".*abcd",[anchored],true,{match,[{0,7}]}),
  295:     ok = crtest("ABCabcdABC","ABCD",[],true,nomatch),
  296:     ok = crtest("ABCabcdABC","ABCD",[caseless],true,{match,[{3,4}]}),
  297:     ok = crtest("abcdABC\n","ABC$",[],true,{match,[{4,3}]}),
  298:     ok = crtest("abcdABC\n","ABC$",[dollar_endonly],true,nomatch),
  299:     ok = crtest("abcdABC\n","ABC.",[],true,nomatch),
  300:     ok = crtest("abcdABC\n","ABC.",[dotall],true,{match,[{4,4}]}),
  301:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","ABC .",[],true,nomatch),
  302:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","ABC .",[extended],true,{match,[{4,4}]}),
  303:     ok = crtest("abcd\nABCD","ABC",[],true,{match,[{5,3}]}),
  304:     ok = crtest("abcd\nABCD","ABC",[firstline],true,nomatch),
  305:     ok = crtest("abcd\nABCD","^ABC",[],true,nomatch),
  306:     ok = crtest("abcd\nABCD","^ABC",[multiline],true,{match,[{5,3}]}),
  307:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","(ABC)",[],true,{match,[{4,3},{4,3}]}),
  308:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","(ABC)",[no_auto_capture],true,{match,[{4,3}]}),
  309:     ok = crtest(notused,"(?<FOO>ABC)|(?<FOO>DEF)",[],false,notused),
  310:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","(?<FOO>ABC)|(?<FOO>DEF)",[dupnames],true,{match,[{4,3},{4,3}]}),
  311:     ok = crtest("abcdABCDabcABCD","abcd.*D",[],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  312:     ok = crtest("abcdABCDabcABCD","abcd.*D",[ungreedy],true,{match,[{0,8}]}),
  313:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[],true,nomatch),
  314:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[{newline,cr}],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  315:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  316:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[{newline,lf}],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  317:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,lf}],true,nomatch),
  318:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,cr}],true,nomatch),
  319:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  320: 
  321:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,nomatch),
  322:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,nomatch),
  323:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  324: 
  325:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  326:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  327: 
  328:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,list}],true,{match,["abcd"]}),
  329: 
  330:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,list}],true,{match,["abcd"]}),
  331: 
  332:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,list}],true,{match,["abcd"]}),
  333: 
  334:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,binary}],true,{match,[<<"abcd">>]}),
  335: 
  336:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,binary}],true,{match,[<<"abcd">>]}),
  337:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,binary}],true,{match,[<<"abcd">>]}),
  338: 
  339:     %% Check that unique run-options fail in compile only case:
  340:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,binary}])),
  341:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{offset,3}])),
  342:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},notempty])),
  343:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},notbol])),
  344:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},noteol])),
  345: 
  346: 
  347:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}]),
  348:     nomatch = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}]),
  349:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","abcd$",[{newline,crlf},multiline]),
  350:     nomatch = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","efgh$",[{newline,crlf},multiline,noteol]),
  351:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","abcd$",[{newline,crlf},multiline,noteol]),
  352:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","^abcd",[{newline,crlf},multiline,noteol]),
  353:     nomatch = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","^abcd",[{newline,crlf},multiline,notbol]),
  354:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","^efgh",[{newline,crlf},multiline,notbol]),
  355:     {match,_} = re:run("ABC\nD","[a-z]*",[{newline,crlf}]),
  356:     nomatch = re:run("ABC\nD","[a-z]*",[{newline,crlf},notempty]),
  357:     ok.
  358: 
  359: %% Test replace with autogenerated erlang module.
  360: replace_autogen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  361:     re_testoutput1_replacement_test:run(),
  362:     ok.
  363: 
  364: %% Test capture options together with global searching.
  365: global_capture(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  366:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[{capture,[1]}]),
  367:     {match,[{10,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[{capture,[1]}]),
  368:     {match,[[{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[global,{capture,[1]}]),
  369:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[{capture,['FOO']}]),
  370:     {match,[{10,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[{capture,['FOO']}]),
  371:     {match,[[{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[global,{capture,['FOO']}]),
  372:     {match,[[{3,4},{3,4}],[{10,4},{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global]),
  373:     {match,[[{3,4},{3,4}],[{10,4},{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global,{capture,all}]),
  374:     {match,[[{3,4},{3,4}],[{10,4},{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global,{capture,all,index}]),
  375:     {match,[[{3,4}],[{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global,{capture,first}]),
  376:     {match,[[{3,4}],[{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global,{capture,all_but_first}]),
  377:     {match,[[<<"bcd">>],[<<"bcd">>]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all_but_first,binary}]),
  378:     {match,[["bcd"],["bcd"]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all_but_first,list}]),
  379:     {match,[["abcd","bcd"],["abcd","bcd"]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,list}]),
  380:     {match,[[<<"abcd">>,<<"bcd">>],[<<"abcd">>,<<"bcd">>]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,binary}]),
  381:     {match,[[{3,4},{4,3}],[{10,4},{11,3}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,index}]),
  382:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,none,index}]),
  383:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,none,binary}]),
  384:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,none,list}]),
  385:     {match,[[<<195,133,98,99,100>>,<<"bcd">>],[<<"abcd">>,<<"bcd">>]]} = re:run("ABCÅbcdABCabcdA",".(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,binary},unicode]),
  386:     {match,[["Åbcd","bcd"],["abcd","bcd"]]} = re:run(<<"ABC",8#303,8#205,"bcdABCabcdA">>,".(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,list},unicode]),
  387:     {match,[["Åbcd","bcd"],["abcd","bcd"]]} = re:run("ABCÅbcdABCabcdA",".(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,list},unicode]),
  388:     {match,[[{3,5},{5,3}],[{11,4},{12,3}]]} = re:run("ABCÅbcdABCabcdA",".(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,index},unicode]),
  389:     ok.
  390: 
  391: %% Test replace with different input types.
  392: replace_input_types(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  393:     <<"abcd">> = re:replace("abcd","Z","X",[{return,binary},unicode]),
  394:     <<"abcd">> = re:replace("abcd","\x{400}","X",[{return,binary},unicode]),
  395:     <<"a",208,128,"cd">> = re:replace(<<"abcd">>,"b","\x{400}",[{return,binary},unicode]),
  396:     ok.
  397: 
  398: %% Test replace with a replacement function.
  399: replace_with_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  400:     <<"ABCD">> = re:replace("abcd", ".", fun(<<C>>, []) -> <<(C - $a + $A)>> end, [global, {return, binary}]),
  401:     <<"AbCd">> = re:replace("abcd", ".", fun(<<C>>, []) when (C - $a) rem 2 =:= 0 -> <<(C - $a + $A)>>; (C, []) -> C end, [global, {return, binary}]),
  402:     <<"b-ad-c">> = re:replace("abcd", "(.)(.)", fun(_, [A, B]) -> <<B/binary, $-, A/binary>> end, [global, {return, binary}]),
  403:     <<"#ab-B#cd">> = re:replace("abcd", ".(.)", fun(Whole, [<<C>>]) -> <<$#, Whole/binary, $-, (C - $a + $A), $#>> end, [{return, binary}]),
  404:     <<"#ab#cd">> = re:replace("abcd", ".(x)?(.)", fun(Whole, [<<>>, _]) -> <<$#, Whole/binary, $#>> end, [{return, binary}]),
  405:     <<"#ab#cd">> = re:replace("abcd", ".(.)(x)?", fun(Whole, [_]) -> <<$#, Whole/binary, $#>> end, [{return, binary}]),
  406:     ok.
  407: 
  408: %% Test return options of replace together with global searching.
  409: replace_return(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  410:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:replace("na","(a","")),
  411:     ok = replacetest(<<"nisse">>,"i","a",[{return,binary}],<<"nasse">>),
  412:     ok = replacetest("ABC\305abcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[global,{return,binary}],<<"ABCÅXABCXA">>),
  413:     ok = replacetest("ABCÅabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[global,{return,iodata}],[<<"ABCÅ">>,<<"X">>,<<"ABC">>,<<"X">>|<<"A">>]),
  414:     ok = replacetest("ABCÅabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[global,{return,list},unicode],"ABCÅXABCXA"),
  415:     ok = replacetest("ABCÅabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[global,{return,binary},unicode],<<65,66,67,195,133,88,65,66,67,88,65>>),
  416:     ok = replacetest("ABCÅabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[{return,binary},unicode],<<65,66,67,195,133,88,65,66,67,97,98,99,100,65>>),
  417:     ok = replacetest("abcdefghijk","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\9X",[{return,binary}],<<"iXk">>),
  418:     ok = replacetest("abcdefghijk","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\10X",[{return,binary}],<<"jXk">>),
  419:     ok = replacetest("abcdefghijk","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\11X",[{return,binary}],<<"Xk">>),
  420:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g9X",[{return,binary}],<<"9X1">>),
  421:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g10X",[{return,binary}],<<"0X1">>),
  422:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g11X",[{return,binary}],<<"X1">>),
  423:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g{9}7",[{return,binary}],<<"971">>),
  424:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g{10}7",[{return,binary}],<<"071">>),
  425:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g{11}7",[{return,binary}],<<"71">>),
  426:     ok = replacetest("a\x{400}bcd","d","X",[global,{return,list},unicode],"a\x{400}bcX"),
  427:     ok = replacetest("a\x{400}bcd","d","X",[global,{return,binary},unicode],<<"a",208,128,"bcX">>),
  428:     ok = replacetest("a\x{400}bcd","Z","X",[global,{return,list},unicode],"a\x{400}bcd"),
  429:     ok = replacetest("a\x{400}bcd","Z","X",[global,{return,binary},unicode],<<"a",208,128,"bcd">>),
  430:     ok.
  431: 
  432: rtest(Subj, RE, Copt, Ropt, match) ->
  433:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(RE,Copt), 
  434:     {match,_} = re:run(Subj,MP,Ropt),
  435:     ok;
  436: rtest(Subj, RE, Copt, Ropt, nomatch) ->
  437:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(RE,Copt), 
  438:     nomatch = re:run(Subj,MP,Ropt),
  439:     ok;
  440: rtest(Subj, RE, Copt, Ropt, badarg) ->
  441:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(RE,Copt),
  442:     ok = try
  443:              re:run(Subj,MP,Ropt),
  444:              error
  445:          catch
  446:              error:badarg -> ok
  447:          end.
  448: 
  449: ctest(_,RE,Options,false,_) ->
  450:     case re:compile(RE,Options) of
  451: 	{ok,_} ->
  452: 	    error;
  453: 	{error,_} ->
  454: 	    ok
  455:     end;
  456: ctest(Subject,RE,Options,true,Result) ->
  457:     {ok, Prog} = re:compile(RE,Options),
  458:     Result = re:run(Subject,Prog,[]),
  459:     ok.
  460: 
  461: crtest(_,RE,Options,false,_) ->
  462:     case (catch re:run("",RE,Options)) of
  463: 	{'EXIT',{badarg,_}} ->
  464: 	    ok;
  465: 	_ ->
  466: 	    error
  467:     end;
  468: crtest(Subject,RE,Options,true,Result) ->
  469:     try
  470: 	Result = re:run(Subject,RE,Options),
  471: 	ok
  472:     catch
  473: 	_:_ ->
  474: 	    error
  475:     end.
  476: 
  477: replacetest(Subject,RE,Replacement,Options,Result) ->
  478:     Result = re:replace(Subject,RE,Replacement,Options),
  479:     {CompileOptions,ReplaceOptions} = lists:partition(fun copt/1, Options),
  480:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(RE,CompileOptions),
  481:     Result = re:replace(Subject,MP,Replacement,ReplaceOptions),
  482:     ok.
  483: 
  484: splittest(Subject,RE,Options,Result) ->
  485:     Result = re:split(Subject,RE,Options),
  486:     {CompileOptions,SplitOptions} = lists:partition(fun copt/1, Options),
  487:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(RE,CompileOptions),
  488:     Result = re:split(Subject,MP,SplitOptions),
  489:     ok.
  490: 
  491: copt(caseless) -> true;
  492: copt(no_start_optimize) -> true;
  493: copt(never_utf) -> true;
  494: copt(ucp) -> true;
  495: copt(dollar_endonly) -> true;
  496: copt(dotall) -> true;
  497: copt(extended) -> true;
  498: copt(firstline) -> true;
  499: copt(multiline) -> true;
  500: copt(no_auto_capture) -> true;
  501: copt(dupnames) -> true;
  502: copt(ungreedy) -> true;
  503: copt(unicode) -> true;
  504: copt(_) -> false.
  505: 
  506: %% Test split with autogenerated erlang module.
  507: split_autogen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  508:     re_testoutput1_split_test:run(),
  509:     ok.
  510: 
  511: %% Test special options to split.
  512: split_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  513:     ok = splittest("", "", [trim], []),
  514:     ok = splittest("", " ", [trim], []),
  515:     ok = splittest("", "()", [group, trim], []),
  516:     ok = splittest("", "( )", [group, trim], []),
  517:     ok = splittest("a b c ","( )",[group,trim],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>]]),
  518:     ok = splittest("a b c ","( )",[group,{parts,0}],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>]]),
  519:     ok = splittest("a b c ","( )",[{parts,infinity},group],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<>>]]),
  520:     ok = splittest("a b c ","( )",[group],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<>>]]),
  521:     ok = splittest(" a b c d ","( +)",[group,trim],[[<<>>,<<" ">>],[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<"d">>,<<" ">>]]),
  522:     ok = splittest(" a b c d ","( +)",[{parts,0},group],[[<<>>,<<" ">>],[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<"d">>,<<" ">>]]),
  523:     ok = splittest(" a b c d ","( +)",[{parts,infinity},group],[[<<>>,<<" ">>],[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<"d">>,<<" ">>],[<<>>]]),
  524:     ok = splittest("a b c d","( +)",[{parts,2},group],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b c d">>]]),
  525:     ok = splittest([967]++" b c d","( +)",[{parts,2},group,{return,list},unicode],[[[967]," "],["b c d"]]),
  526:     ok = splittest([967]++" b c d","( +)",[{parts,2},group,{return,binary},unicode],[[<<207,135>>,<<" ">>],[<<"b c d">>]]),
  527:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split([967]++" b c d","( +)",[{parts,2},group,{return,binary}])),
  528:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("a b c d","( +)",[{parts,-2}])),
  529:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("a b c d","( +)",[{parts,banan}])),
  530:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("a b c d","( +)",[{capture,all}])),
  531:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("a b c d","( +)",[{capture,[],binary}])),
  532:     %% Parts 0 is equal to no parts specification (implicit strip)
  533:     ok = splittest("a b c d","( *)",[{parts,0},{return,list}],["a"," ","b"," ","c"," ","d"]),
  534:     ok.
  535: 
  536: join([]) -> [];
  537: join([A]) -> [A];
  538: join([H|T]) -> [H,<<":">>|join(T)].
  539: 
  540: %% Some special cases of split that are easy to get wrong.
  541: split_specials(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  542:     %% More or less just to remember these icky cases
  543:     <<"::abd:f">> =
  544: 	iolist_to_binary(join(re:split("abdf","^(?!(ab)de|x)(abd)(f)",[trim]))),
  545:     <<":abc2xyzabc3">> =
  546: 	iolist_to_binary(join(re:split("abc1abc2xyzabc3","\\Aabc.",[trim]))),
  547:     ok.
  548: 
  549: 
  550: %% Test that errors are handled correctly by the erlang code.
  551: error_handling(_Config) ->
  552:     %% This test checks the exception tuples manufactured in the erlang
  553:     %% code to hide the trapping from the user at least when it comes to errors
  554: 
  555:     %% The malformed precomiled RE is detected after
  556:     %% the trap to re:grun from grun, in the grun function clause
  557:     %% that handles precompiled expressions
  558:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,run,["apa",{1,2,3,4},[global]],_},
  559:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  560: 	(catch re:run("apa",{1,2,3,4},[global])),
  561:     %% An invalid capture list will also cause a badarg late,
  562:     %% but with a non pre compiled RE, the exception should be thrown by the
  563:     %% grun function clause that handles RE's compiled implicitly by
  564:     %% the run/3 BIF before trapping.
  565:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,run,["apa","p",[{capture,[1,{a}]},global]],_},
  566:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  567: 	(catch re:run("apa","p",[{capture,[1,{a}]},global])),
  568:     %% And so the case of a precompiled expression together with
  569:     %% a compile-option (binary and list subject):
  570:     {ok,RE} = re:compile("(p)"),
  571:     {match,[[{1,1},{1,1}]]} = re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[global]),
  572:     {match,[[{1,1},{1,1}]]} = re:run("apa",RE,[global]),
  573:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,run,
  574: 		      [<<"apa">>,
  575: 		       {re_pattern,1,0,_,_},
  576: 		       [global,unicode]],_},
  577:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  578: 	(catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[global,unicode])),
  579:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,run,
  580: 		      ["apa",
  581: 		       {re_pattern,1,0,_,_},
  582: 		       [global,unicode]],_},
  583:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  584: 	(catch re:run("apa",RE,[global,unicode])),
  585:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("apa","(p",[])),
  586:     {error, {compile, {_,_}}} = re:run("apa","(p",[report_errors]),
  587:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("apa","(p",[global])),
  588:     {error, {compile, {_,_}}} = re:run("apa","(p",[report_errors,global]),
  589:     %% Badly formed options
  590:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,["global"])),
  591:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{offset,-1}])),
  592:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{offset,ett}])),
  593:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{captore,[1,2],binary}])),
  594:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{capture,[1,2],binary,list}])),
  595:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{capture,[1,2],bunary}])),
  596:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{capture,{1,2},binary}])),
  597:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{newline,3}])),
  598:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{newline,apa}])),
  599:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{njuline,cr}])),
  600:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{<<"newline">>,cr}])),
  601:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[global|dupnames])),
  602:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run([<<"ap">>|$a],RE,[])), % Not an IO-list
  603:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile([<<"ap">>|$a],[])), % Not an IO-list
  604:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{capture,[0|1],binary}])),
  605:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,
  606: 					[{capture,[<<"apa">>|1],binary}])), 
  607:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,
  608: 					[{capture,[[<<"ap">>|$a]],binary}])), 
  609:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,[<<"(p">>|41],[])), 
  610:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,{re_pattern,3,0,0,[]},[])),
  611:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,{re_pattern,3,0,0,<<"apa">>},[])),
  612:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,{re_pattern,3,0,0,<<"apa",3:2>>},[])),
  613:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa",2:2>>,<<"(p)">>,[{capture,[0,1],binary}])), 
  614:     <<_:4,Temp:3/binary,_:4>> = <<38,23,6,18>>,
  615:     {match,[{1,1},{1,1}]} = re:run(Temp,<<"(p)">>,[]), % Unaligned works 
  616:     %% The replace errors:
  617:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,["apa",{1,2,3,4},"X",[]],_},
  618:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  619: 	(catch re:replace("apa",{1,2,3,4},"X",[])),
  620:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,["apa",{1,2,3,4},"X",[global]],_},
  621:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  622: 	(catch re:replace("apa",{1,2,3,4},"X",[global])),
  623:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  624: 		      ["apa",
  625: 		       {re_pattern,1,0,_,_},
  626: 		       "X",
  627: 		       [unicode]],_},
  628:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  629: 	(catch re:replace("apa",RE,"X",[unicode])),
  630:     <<"aXa">> = iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",[])),
  631:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  632: 		      ["apa","p","X",[report_errors]],_},
  633:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  634: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",
  635: 					   [report_errors]))),
  636:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  637: 		      ["apa","p","X",[{capture,all,binary}]],_},
  638:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  639: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",
  640: 					   [{capture,all,binary}]))),
  641:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  642: 		      ["apa","p","X",[{capture,all}]],_},
  643:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  644: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",
  645: 					   [{capture,all}]))),
  646:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  647: 		      ["apa","p","X",[{return,banana}]],_},
  648:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  649: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",
  650: 					   [{return,banana}]))),
  651:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:replace("apa","(p","X",[])),
  652:     %% Badarg, not compile error.
  653:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  654: 		      ["apa","(p","X",[{return,banana}]],_},
  655:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  656: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","(p","X",
  657: 					   [{return,banana}]))),
  658:     %% And the split errors:
  659:     [<<"a">>,<<"a">>] = (catch re:split("apa","p",[])),
  660:     [<<"a">>,<<"p">>,<<"a">>] = (catch re:split("apa",RE,[])),
  661:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa","p",[report_errors]],_},
  662:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  663: 	(catch re:split("apa","p",[report_errors])),
  664:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa","p",[global]],_},
  665:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  666: 	(catch re:split("apa","p",[global])),
  667:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa","p",[{capture,all}]],_},
  668:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  669: 	(catch re:split("apa","p",[{capture,all}])),
  670:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa","p",[{capture,all,binary}]],_},
  671:                      {?MODULE, ?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  672: 	(catch re:split("apa","p",[{capture,all,binary}])),
  673:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa",{1,2,3,4}],_},
  674:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  675: 	(catch re:split("apa",{1,2,3,4})),
  676:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa",{1,2,3,4},[]],_},
  677:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  678: 	(catch re:split("apa",{1,2,3,4},[])),
  679:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,
  680: 		      ["apa",
  681: 		       RE,
  682: 		       [unicode]],_},
  683:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  684: 	(catch re:split("apa",RE,[unicode])),
  685:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,
  686: 		      ["apa",
  687: 		       RE,
  688: 		       [{return,banana}]],_},
  689:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  690: 	(catch re:split("apa",RE,[{return,banana}])),
  691:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,
  692: 		      ["apa",
  693: 		       RE,
  694: 		       [banana]],_},
  695:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  696: 	(catch re:split("apa",RE,[banana])),
  697:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("apa","(p")),
  698:     %%Exception on bad argument, not compilation error
  699:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,
  700: 		      ["apa",
  701: 		       "(p",
  702: 		       [banana]],_},
  703:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  704: 	(catch re:split("apa","(p",[banana])),
  705:     ok.
  706: 
  707: %% Fix as in http://vcs.pcre.org/viewvc?revision=360&view=revision
  708: pcre_cve_2008_2371(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  709:     %% Make sure it doesn't crash the emulator.
  710:     re:compile(<<"(?i)[\xc3\xa9\xc3\xbd]|[\xc3\xa9\xc3\xbdA]">>, [unicode]),
  711:     ok.
  712: 
  713: %% Patch from
  714: %% http://vcs.pcre.org/viewvc/code/trunk/pcre_compile.c?r1=504&r2=505&view=patch
  715: pcre_compile_workspace_overflow(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  716:     N = 1180,
  717:     ExpStr = "Got expected error: ",
  718:     case re:compile([lists:duplicate(N, $(), lists:duplicate(N, $))]) of
  719:         {error, {"regular expression is too complicated" = Str,2360}} ->
  720:             {comment, ExpStr ++ Str};
  721:         {error, {"parentheses are too deeply nested (stack check)" = Str, _No}} ->
  722:             {comment, ExpStr ++ Str};
  723:         Other ->
  724:             ct:fail({unexpected, Other})
  725:     end.
  726: 
  727: %% Make sure matches that really loop infinitely actually fail.
  728: re_infinite_loop(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  729:     Str =
  730:         "http:/www.flickr.com/slideShow/index.gne?group_id=&user_id=69845378@N0",
  731:     EMail_regex = "[a-z0-9!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+"
  732:         ++ "(\.[a-z0-9!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+)*"
  733:         ++ "@.*([a-z0-9](?:[a-z0-9-]*[a-z0-9])?\.)+"
  734:         ++ "([a-zA-Z]{2}|com|org|net|gov|mil"
  735:         ++ "|biz|info|mobi|name|aero|jobs|museum)",
  736:     nomatch = re:run(Str, EMail_regex),
  737:     nomatch = re:run(Str, EMail_regex, [global]),
  738:     {error,match_limit} = re:run(Str, EMail_regex,[report_errors]),
  739:     {error,match_limit} = re:run(Str, EMail_regex,[report_errors,global]),
  740:     ok.
  741: 
  742: %% Check for nasty bug where accented graphemes can make PCRE back
  743: %% past beginning of subject.
  744: re_backwards_accented(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  745:     match = re:run(<<65,204,128,65,204,128,97,98,99>>,
  746: 		   <<"\\X?abc">>,
  747: 		   [unicode,{capture,none}]),
  748:     ok.
  749: 
  750: %% Check correct handling of dupnames option to re.
  751: opt_dupnames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  752:     Days = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"],
  753:     _ = [ begin
  754: 	      Short = lists:sublist(Day,3),
  755: 	      {match,[Short]} =
  756: 		  re:run(Day,
  757: 			 "(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  758: 			 "(?<DN>Wed)(?:nesday)?|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  759: 			 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  760: 			 [dupnames, {capture, ['DN'], list}])
  761: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  762:     _ = [ begin
  763: 	      Short = list_to_binary(lists:sublist(Day,3)),
  764: 	      {match,[Short]} =
  765: 		  re:run(Day,
  766: 			 "(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  767: 			 "(?<DN>Wed)(?:nesday)?|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  768: 			 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  769: 			 [dupnames, {capture, ['DN'], binary}])
  770: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  771:     _ = [ begin
  772: 	      {match,[{0,3}]} =
  773: 		  re:run(Day,
  774: 			 "(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  775: 			 "(?<DN>Wed)(?:nesday)?|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  776: 			 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  777: 			 [dupnames, {capture, ['DN'], index}])
  778: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  779:     {match,[{0,1},{1,3},{7,1}]} = re:run("SMondayX","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  780: 					 "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  781: 					 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  782: 					 [dupnames, {capture, ['Skrap','DN','Skrap2'],index}]),
  783:     {match,[{-1,0},{0,3},{-1,0}]} = re:run("Wednesday","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  784: 					   "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  785: 					   "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  786: 					   [dupnames, {capture, ['Skrap','DN','Skrap2'],index}]),
  787:     nomatch = re:run("Wednsday","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  788: 		     "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  789: 		     "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  790: 		     [dupnames, {capture, ['Skrap','DN','Skrap2'],index}]),
  791:     {match,[<<>>]} = re:run("Subject","b",[dupnames,{capture,['B'],binary}]),
  792:     {match,[<<"S">>,<<"u">>,<<"b">>,<<"j">>,<<"e">>,<<"c">>,
  793: 	    <<"t">>,<<"I">>,<<"s">>,<<"M">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,<<"e">>,
  794: 	    <<"T">>,<<"h">>,<<"a">>,<<"n">>,<<"T">>,<<"e">>,<<"n">>]} =
  795: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen",
  796: 	       "(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)"
  797: 	       "(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)(?<e>e)(?<T>T)"
  798: 	       "(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<n>n)",
  799: 	       [dupnames,{capture,['S','u','b','j','e','c','t',
  800: 				   'I','s','M','o','r','e','T',
  801: 				   'h','a','n','T','e','n'],binary}]),
  802:     {match,[<<"S">>,<<"u">>,<<"b">>,<<"j">>,<<"e">>,<<"c">>,
  803: 	    <<"t">>,<<"I">>,<<"s">>,<<"M">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,<<"e">>,
  804: 	    <<"T">>,<<"h">>,<<"a">>,<<"n">>,<<"T">>,<<"e">>,<<"n">>]} =
  805: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen",
  806: 	       "(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)"
  807: 	       "(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)(?<e>e)(?<T>T)"
  808: 	       "(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<n>n)",
  809: 	       [dupnames,
  810: 		{capture,all_but_first,list},
  811: 		{capture,['S','u','b','j','e','c','t',
  812: 			  'I','s','M','o','r','e','T',
  813: 			  'h','a','n','T','e','n'],binary}]),
  814:     {match,[<<"S">>,<<"u">>,<<"b">>,<<"j">>,<<"e">>,<<"c">>,
  815: 	    <<"t">>,<<"I">>,<<"s">>,<<"M">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,<<"e">>,
  816: 	    <<"T">>,<<"h">>,<<"a">>,<<"n">>,<<"T">>,<<"e">>,<<"n">>]} =
  817: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen",
  818: 	       "(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)"
  819: 	       "(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)(?<e>e)(?<T>T)"
  820: 	       "(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<n>n)",
  821: 	       [dupnames,
  822: 		{capture,["S","u","b","j","e","c","t",
  823: 			  "I","s","M","o","r","e","T",
  824: 			  "h","a","n","T","e","n"],binary}]), 
  825:     {match,[<<"S">>,<<"u">>,<<"b">>,<<"j">>,<<"e">>,<<"c">>,
  826: 	    <<"t">>,<<"I">>,<<"s">>,<<"M">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,<<"e">>,
  827: 	    <<"T">>,<<"h">>,<<"a">>,<<"n">>,<<"T">>,<<"e">>,<<"n">>]} =
  828: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen",
  829: 	       "(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)"
  830: 	       "(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)(?<e>e)(?<T>T)"
  831: 	       "(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<then>n)",
  832: 	       [dupnames,
  833: 		{capture,["S","u","b","j","e","c","t",
  834: 			  "I","s","M","o","r","e","T",
  835: 			  "h","a","n","T","e","then"],binary}]), 
  836:     ok.
  837: 
  838: %% Test capturing of all_names.
  839: opt_all_names(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  840:     Days = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"],
  841:     {match,[{1,3},{0,1},{7,1}]} = re:run("SMondayX","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  842: 					 "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  843: 					 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  844: 					 [dupnames, {capture, all_names,index}]),
  845:     {match,[{0,3},{-1,0},{-1,0}]} = re:run("Wednesday","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  846: 					   "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  847: 					   "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  848: 					   [dupnames, {capture, all_names,index}]),
  849: 
  850:     _ = [ begin
  851: 	      {match,[{0,3}]} =
  852: 		  re:run(Day,
  853: 			 "(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  854: 			 "(?<DN>Wed)(?:nesday)?|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  855: 			 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  856: 			 [dupnames, {capture, all_names, index}])
  857: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  858:     _ = [ begin
  859: 	      match =
  860: 		  re:run(Day,
  861: 			 "(Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  862: 			 "(Wed)(?:nesday)?|(Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  863: 			 "(Sat)(?:urday)?",
  864: 			 [dupnames, {capture, all_names, index}])
  865: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  866:     {match,[{0,1},{-1,0},{-1,0}]} = re:run("A","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  867:     {match,[{-1,0},{0,1},{-1,0}]} = re:run("B","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  868:     {match,[{-1,0},{-1,0},{0,1}]} = re:run("C","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  869:     {match,[<<"A">>,<<>>,<<>>]} = re:run("A","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  870:     {match,[<<>>,<<"B">>,<<>>]} = re:run("B","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  871:     {match,[<<>>,<<>>,<<"C">>]} = re:run("C","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  872:     {match,["A",[],[]]} = re:run("A","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  873:     {match,[[],"B",[]]} = re:run("B","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  874:     {match,[[],[],"C"]} = re:run("C","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  875:     {match,[{-1,0},{-1,0},{0,1}]} = re:run("A","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  876:     {match,[{-1,0},{0,1},{-1,0}]} = re:run("B","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  877:     {match,[{0,1},{-1,0},{-1,0}]} = re:run("C","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  878:     {match,[<<>>,<<>>,<<"A">>]} = re:run("A","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  879:     {match,[<<>>,<<>>,<<"A">>]} = re:run("A","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_but_first, binary},{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  880:     {match,[<<>>,<<"B">>,<<>>]} = re:run("B","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  881:     {match,[<<"C">>,<<>>,<<>>]} = re:run("C","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  882:     {match,[[],[],"A"]} = re:run("A","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  883:     {match,[[],"B",[]]} = re:run("B","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  884:     {match,["C",[],[]]} = re:run("C","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  885:     {match,[[<<>>,<<>>,<<"C">>],
  886: 	    [<<>>,<<>>,<<"C">>],
  887: 	    [<<>>,<<>>,<<"C">>]]} = re:run("CCC","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",
  888: 					   [global,{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  889:     {match,[[<<"C">>,<<>>],
  890: 	    [<<>>,<<"B">>],
  891: 	    [<<"C">>,<<>>]]} = re:run("CBC","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",
  892: 				      [global,dupnames,{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  893:     {match,[[]]} = re:run("ABCE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A'],list}]),
  894:     {match,["D"]} = re:run("ABCDE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A'],list}]),
  895:     {match,["F"]} = re:run("ABCFE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A'],list}]),
  896:     {match,["F",[]]} = re:run("ABCFE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A','B'],list}]),
  897:     {match,[[],"E"]} = re:run("ABCE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A','B'],list}]),
  898:     {match,[[],"E"]} = re:run("ABCE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,all_names,list}]),
  899:     {match,[{-1,0},{3,1}]}  = re:run("ABCE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,all_names,index}]),
  900:     match = re:run("Subject","b",[dupnames,{capture,all_names,binary}]),
  901:     {match,[<<"I">>,<<"M">>,<<"S">>,<<"T">>,<<"a">>,<<"b">>,              
  902: 	    <<"c">>,<<"e">>,<<"h">>,<<"j">>,<<"n">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,
  903: 	    <<"s">>,<<"t">>,<<"u">>]} =
  904: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen","(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)"
  905: 	       "(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)"
  906: 	       "(?<e>e)(?<T>T)(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<n>n)",
  907: 	       [dupnames,{capture,all_names,binary}]),
  908:     ok.
  909: 
  910: %% Test the minimal inspect function.
  911: inspect(Config) when is_list(Config)->
  912:     {ok,MP} = re:compile("(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)."),
  913:     {namelist,[<<"A">>,<<"B">>,<<"C">>]} = re:inspect(MP,namelist),
  914:     {ok,MPD} = re:compile("(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C).",[dupnames]),
  915:     {namelist,[<<"A">>,<<"B">>]} = re:inspect(MPD,namelist),
  916:     {ok,MPN} = re:compile("(A)|(B)|(C)."),
  917:     {namelist,[]} = re:inspect(MPN,namelist),
  918:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:inspect(MPD,namelistk)),
  919:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:inspect({re_pattern,3,0,0,<<"kalle">>},namelist)),
  920:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:inspect({re_pattern,3,0,0,<<"kalle",2:2>>},namelist)),
  921:     ok.
  922: 
  923: %% Test that the no_start_optimize compilation flag works.
  924: opt_no_start_optimize(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  925:     {match, [{3,3}]} = re:run("DEFABC","(*COMMIT)ABC",[]), % Start optimization makes this result wrong!
  926:     nomatch = re:run("DEFABC","(*COMMIT)ABC",[no_start_optimize]), % This is the correct result...
  927:     ok.
  928: 
  929: %% Check that the never_utf option works.
  930: opt_never_utf(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  931:     {match,[{0,3}]} = re:run("ABC","ABC",[never_utf]),
  932:     {match,[{0,3}]} = re:run("ABC","(*UTF)ABC",[]),
  933:     {ok,_} = re:compile("(*UTF)ABC"),
  934:     {ok,_} = re:compile("(*UTF)ABC",[unicode]),
  935:     {ok,_} = re:compile("(*UTF8)ABC"),
  936:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("ABC","ABC",[unicode,never_utf])),
  937:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("ABC","(*UTF)ABC",[never_utf])),
  938:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("ABC","(*UTF8)ABC",[never_utf])),
  939:     {error,_} = (catch re:compile("ABC",[unicode,never_utf])),
  940:     {error,_} = (catch re:compile("(*UTF)ABC",[never_utf])),
  941:     {error,_} = (catch re:compile("(*UTF8)ABC",[never_utf])),
  942:     ok.
  943: 
  944: %% Check that the ucp option is passed to PCRE.
  945: opt_ucp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  946:     {match,[{0,1}]} = re:run([$a],"\\w",[unicode]),
  947:     nomatch = re:run([229],"\\w",[unicode]), % Latin1 do not work without UCP anymore, ASCII is default
  948:     nomatch = re:run([1024],"\\w",[unicode]), % and neither do non Latin1 code points.
  949:     {match,[{0,2}]} = re:run([229],"\\w",[unicode,ucp]),  % Need ucp for Latin1
  950:     {match,[{0,2}]} = re:run([1024],"\\w",[unicode,ucp]), % Any Unicode word character works with 'ucp'
  951:     ok.
  952: 
  953: %% Check that the match_limit and match_limit_recursion options work.
  954: match_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  955:     nomatch = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[]),
  956:     nomatch = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit,3000}]),
  957:     nomatch = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit_recursion,10}]),
  958:     nomatch = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[report_errors]),
  959:     {error,match_limit} = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit,3000},
  960: 							     report_errors]),
  961:     {error,match_limit_recursion} = 
  962: 	re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit_recursion,10},
  963: 					   report_errors]),
  964:     {error,match_limit} = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit,3000},
  965: 							     report_errors,global]),
  966:     {error,match_limit_recursion} = 
  967: 	re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit_recursion,10},
  968: 					   report_errors,global]),
  969:     ["aaaaaaaaaaaaaz"] = re:split("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",
  970: 				  [{match_limit_recursion,10},{return,list}]),
  971:     ["aaaaaaaaaaaaaz"] = re:split("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",
  972: 				  [{match_limit,3000},{return,list}]),
  973:     "aaaaaaaaaaaaaz" = re:replace("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz","!",
  974: 				  [{match_limit_recursion,10},{return,list}]),
  975:     "aaaaaaaaaaaaaz" = re:replace("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz","!",
  976: 				  [{match_limit,3000},{return,list}]),
  977:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch re:replace("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz","!",
  978: 					     [{match_limit_recursion,-1},{return,list}])),
  979:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch re:replace("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz","!",
  980: 					     [{match_limit,-1},{return,list}])),
  981:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",
  982: 					 [{match_limit_recursion,-1},
  983: 					  report_errors,global])),
  984:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",
  985: 					 [{match_limit,-1},
  986: 					  report_errors,global])),
  987:     ok.
  988: %% Test that we get sub-binaries if subject is a binary and we capture
  989: %% binaries.
  990: sub_binaries(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  991:     %% The GC can auto-convert tiny sub-binaries to heap binaries, so we
  992:     %% extract large sequences to make the test more stable.
  993:     Bin = << <<I>> || I <- lists:seq(1, 4096) >>,
  994:     {match,[B,C]}=re:run(Bin,"a(.+)$",[{capture,all,binary}]),
  995:     true = byte_size(B) =/= byte_size(C),
  996:     4096 = binary:referenced_byte_size(B),
  997:     4096 = binary:referenced_byte_size(C),
  998:     {match,[D]}=re:run(Bin,"a(.+)$",[{capture,[1],binary}]),
  999:     4096 = binary:referenced_byte_size(D),
 1000:     ok.
 1001: 
 1002: bad_utf8_subject(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1003:     %% OTP-16553: re:run() did not badarg
 1004:     %% if both pattern and subject was binaries
 1005:     %% even though subject contained illegal
 1006:     %% utf8...
 1007: 
 1008:     %% OTP-19015: re:run() ended up in an infinite loop
 1009:     %% if both pattern and subject was binaries and
 1010:     %% subject was long enough to trigger a yield.
 1011: 
 1012:     nomatch = re:run(<<255,255,255>>, <<"a">>, []),
 1013:     nomatch = re:run(<<255,255,255>>, "a", []),
 1014:     nomatch = re:run(<<"aaa">>, <<255>>, []),
 1015:     nomatch = re:run(<<"aaa">>, [255], []),
 1016:     {match,[{0,1}]} = re:run(<<255,255,255>>, <<255>>, []),
 1017:     {match,[{0,1}]} = re:run(<<255,255,255>>, [255], []),
 1018:     [
 1019:      begin
 1020:          %% Badarg on illegal utf8 in subject as of OTP 23...
 1021:          try
 1022:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, 255,255,255>>, <<"a">>, [unicode]),
 1023:              error(unexpected)
 1024:          catch
 1025:              error:badarg ->
 1026:                  ok
 1027:          end,
 1028:          try
 1029:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, 255,255,255>>, "a", [unicode]),
 1030:              error(unexpected)
 1031:          catch
 1032:              error:badarg ->
 1033:                  ok
 1034:          end,
 1035:          try
 1036:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, "aaa">>, <<255>>, [unicode]),
 1037:              error(unexpected)
 1038:          catch
 1039:              error:badarg ->
 1040:                  ok
 1041:          end,
 1042:          nomatch = re:run(<<Prefix/binary, "aaa">>, [255], [unicode]),
 1043:          try
 1044:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, 255,255,255>>, <<255>>, [unicode]),
 1045:              error(unexpected)
 1046:          catch
 1047:              error:badarg ->
 1048:                  ok
 1049:          end,
 1050:          try
 1051:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, 255,255,255>>, [255], [unicode]),
 1052:              error(unexpected)
 1053:          catch
 1054:              error:badarg ->
 1055:                  ok
 1056:          end
 1057:      end || Prefix <- [<<>>, iolist_to_binary(lists:duplicate(100000, $a))]],
 1058:     ok.
 1059: 
 1060: error_info(_Config) ->
 1061:     BadRegexp = {re_pattern,0,0,0,<<"xyz">>},
 1062:     BadErr = "neither an iodata term",
 1063:     {ok,GoodRegexp} = re:compile(".*"),
 1064:     InvalidRegexp = <<"(.*))">>,
 1065:     InvalidErr = "could not parse regular expression\n.*unmatched closing parenthesis.*",
 1066: 
 1067:     L = [{compile, [not_iodata]},
 1068:          {compile, [not_iodata, not_list],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
 1069:          {compile, [<<".*">>, [a|b]]},
 1070:          {compile, [<<".*">>, [bad_option]]},
 1071:          {compile, [{a,b}, [bad_option]],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
 1072: 
 1073:          {grun, 3},                             %Internal.
 1074: 
 1075:          {inspect,[BadRegexp, namelist]},
 1076:          {inspect,["", namelist]},
 1077:          {inspect,[GoodRegexp, 999]},
 1078:          {inspect,[GoodRegexp, bad_inspect_item]},
 1079: 
 1080:          {internal_run, 4},                     %Internal.
 1081: 
 1082:          {replace, [{a,b}, {x,y}, {z,z}],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 1083:          {replace, [{a,b}, BadRegexp, {z,z}],[{1,".*"},{2,BadErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1084:          {replace, [{a,b}, InvalidRegexp, {z,z}],[{1,".*"},{2,InvalidErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1085: 
 1086:          {replace, [{a,b}, {x,y}, {z,z}, [a|b]],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"},{3,".*"},{4,".*"}]},
 1087:          {replace, [{a,b}, BadRegexp, [bad_option]],[{1,".*"},{2,BadErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1088:          {replace, [{a,b}, InvalidRegexp, [bad_option]],[{1,".*"},{2,InvalidErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1089:          {replace, ["", "", {z,z}, not_a_list],[{3,".*"},{4,".*"}]},
 1090: 
 1091:          {run, [{a,b}, {x,y}],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
 1092:          {run, [{a,b}, ".*"]},
 1093:          {run, ["abc", {x,y}]},
 1094:          {run, ["abc", BadRegexp],[{2,BadErr}]},
 1095:          {run, ["abc", InvalidRegexp],[{2,InvalidErr}]},
 1096: 
 1097:          {run, [{a,b}, {x,y}, []],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
 1098:          {run, ["abc", BadRegexp, []],[{2,BadErr}]},
 1099:          {run, ["abc", InvalidRegexp, []],[{2,InvalidErr}]},
 1100:          {run, [{a,b}, {x,y}, [a|b]],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 1101:          {run, [{a,b}, ".*", bad_options],[{1,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 1102:          {run, ["abc", {x,y}, [bad_option]],[{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 1103:          {run, ["abc", BadRegexp, 9999],[{2,BadErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1104:          {run, ["abc", InvalidRegexp, 9999],[{2,InvalidErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1105: 
 1106:          {split, ["abc", BadRegexp],[{2,BadErr}]},
 1107:          {split, ["abc", InvalidRegexp],[{2,InvalidErr}]},
 1108:          {split, [{a,b}, ".*"]},
 1109: 
 1110:          {split, ["abc", BadRegexp, [a|b]],[{2,BadErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1111:          {split, ["abc", InvalidRegexp, [a|b]],[{2,InvalidErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1112:          {split, [{a,b}, ".*", [bad_option]]},
 1113: 
 1114:          {ucompile, 2},                         %Internal.
 1115:          {urun, 3}                              %Internal.
 1116:         ],
 1117:     error_info_lib:test_error_info(re, L).
